document_name: Integrating Climate Change Risks into Resilient Island Planning in the Maldives_ Pro Doc.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/MDV/00058332/Integrating Climate Change Risks into Resilient Island Planning in the Maldives_ Pro Doc.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
The costs and benefits of different adaptation options in the fields of land use planning and coastal protection assessed and  the necessary institutional and individual capacity at national, provincial, atoll and island levels developed to enable decentralized and well-informed decision-making by developing detailed technical guidelines and
demonstrating practical, locally prioritized adaptation options for flooding and erosion control on at least three islands in three different atolls.

project_descr: INTEGRATING CLIMATE CHANGE RISKS  INTO RESILIENT ISLAND PLANNING IN THE MALDIVES
project_title: INTEGRATING CLIMATE CHANGE  RISKS IN MALDIVES PROJECT
